properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_ID, RECEIVE_ID, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE USER_ID = ? AND RECEIVE_ID = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_ID, RECEIVE_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, SECRET, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD JOIN CHARACTER USING (USER_ID) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, SECRET FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ?, SECRET = ?, CREATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
